remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音识别语法是一组规则或约束定义语音识别引擎可以识别为有意义的输入。A speech recognition grammar is a set of rules or constraints that define what a speech recognition engine can recognize as meaningful input. 有关创建和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14))，[使用 XML 创建语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1)，[创建语法使用 GrammarBuilder](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)，并[创建使用 SrgsGrammar](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361680(v%3doffice.14))。For more information about creating and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361633(v=office.14)), [Create Grammars Using XML](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1), [Create Grammars Using GrammarBuilder](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae), and [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361680(v%3doffice.14)). 创作语法后，必须生成到对象语音识别引擎可以加载和应用程序可以使用在运行时管理语音识别。After you author a grammar, you must build it into a object that a speech recognition engine can load and that your application can use at runtime to manage speech recognition. 可以使用构造函数来创建实例与或对象，或从文件或包含受支持的格式语法的说明。You can use a constructor to create a instance from a or a object, or from a file or a that contains a description of a grammar in a supported format. 支持的格式如下所示：Supported formats include the following: - 符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 1.0 版](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - 已编译为.cfg 文件扩展名的二进制文件的语法Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension 语法构造函数接受其参数中的 XML 格式语法文件编译到要由语音识别引擎加载和使用情况进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 语法。Grammar constructors that accept XML-format grammar files in their arguments compile the XML grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 可以减少构建所需的时间量对象从一种 XML 格式语法通过编译语法，请提前使用之一方法。You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the methods. 应用程序的语音识别引擎，因为由管理或对象，可以加载多个语音识别语法。An application's speech recognition engine, as managed by a or object, can load multiple speech recognition grammars. 应用程序可以单独启用或禁用各个语法通过设置属性，并修改通过识别行为属性，如和属性。The application can independently enable or disable individual grammars by setting the property, and modify recognition behavior through properties, such as the and properties. 语法的输入匹配通过语法的路径时引发事件。The grammar’s event is raised when input matches a path through the grammar. > [!NOTE] > 若要验证的任何 URI 或用于生成的 DLL 安全性最佳做法是对象。It is a best practice to verify the safety of any URI or DLL used to build a object. > > Windows 和语音平台提供了构建的应用程序的安全性实例从 DLL 或从支持的脚本的语法。Windows and the Speech platform provide security for applications constructing a instance from a DLL or from a grammar that supports scripting. > > 在脚本始终运行对象，如同从网页中下载`Internet Zone`。Scripts in objects are always run as if downloaded from a web page in the `Internet Zone`. 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 将加载获取语法定义任何 DLL 中隔离出来。The Common Language Runtime (CLR) isolates any DLL loaded to obtain a grammar definition. ## Examples 下面的示例构造从语音识别语法的 XML 文件 (cities.xml) 中定义的对象。The following example constructs a object from a speech recognition grammar defined in a XML file (cities.xml). Cities.xml 文件的内容显示在下面的 XML 示例。The content of the cities.xml file appears in the following XML example. ```csharp // Load a cities grammar from a local file and return the grammar object. private static Grammar CreateGrammarFromFile() { Grammar citiesGrammar = new Grammar(@"c:\temp\cities.xml"); citiesGrammar.Name = "SRGS File Cities Grammar"; return citiesGrammar; } ``` ```xml I would like to fly from to Seattle Los Angeles New York Miami ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强类型对象 (`IsStg`等于`true`) 可以返回到客户端应用程序的强类型化结果 （对象，而非原始文本）。A strongly-typed object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application. 例如，可能会返回强类型化语法对象而不是原始识别的输入。For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return objects rather than raw recognized input. 您可以通过将代码附加到的语法规则来实现强类型语法。You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar. 识别引擎处理任何给定的规则，作为采用输入当前部分结果、 执行关联的代码和文本信息变得丰富类型对象。As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects. 这允许客户端要更轻松地使用增强的语义检查，支持针对多个区域性和内部语法逻辑。This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic. 强类型化的实例对象通常从程序集作为中的资源获取的公共语言运行时 (CLR)。Instances of strongly-typed objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a of the Common Language Runtime (CLR). 使用以支持不同语言的本地化的类型是此类示例对象。The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such objects.
